title: Cosmic Web Interface
description: A dark, ethereal web interface design with animated elements and cosmic aesthetics.
context: Created for a digital art collective focusing on space-themed visuals.
outcome: Increased user engagement by 40% and featured in design showcases.

title: Gothic Portfolio Template
description: A minimalist portfolio template with dark themes and elegant typography.
context: Designed for artists and creatives seeking a sophisticated online presence.
outcome: Downloaded 500+ times and adapted by various creative professionals.

title: Ethereal Brand Identity
description: Complete brand identity system with mystical and modern elements.
context: Branding project for a wellness and meditation app startup.
outcome: Helped client secure $50k in seed funding with strong visual identity.
